subject: Haptic
description_text:
Hello , i just receive my haptic , everything work but,  i have a problem
when i exit the game , the haptic still working all at the same frequency
vibration . I had check the forum and have done some ajustment such as add
the non conductive washer in between the haptic and the support on all my
pedal . I have also bolted on and grounded the Simmons control box directly
on my metal frame . I still have the same problem even ive done those
thing.  Could you please come back with a solution ? I really enjoy the
pedal but i think im gonna have to refund the haptic if the problem
persist...

Thank you very much

conversations.body_text: Hi billy dancause,  If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding

I also saw that there is a three pin white connector with the pedal that
dont seem to connect nowwhere on the control box . Do i need to do
something with it?

Le mar. 16 déc. 2025, 22 h 39, service@simsonn.com
Hi billy dancause,  If you did not purchase the base plate, you can ignore this part, as it is only used for the LED strip on the base plate.
